definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解于甲醇并加入过量氢氧化铵。

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 当食用油冷却时，先将甲醇和氢氧化钠。

sentences.english: Hydroxides include the familiar alkalies of laboratory and industrial processes.
sentences.chinese: 氢氧化物包括实验室和工业过程中常用的碱。

sentences.english: Magnesium aluminum hydroxides show higher adsorption capacity to the model pitch and stickies at neutral pH.
sentences.chinese: 氢氧化镁铝对树脂和胶黏物在中性条件下吸附量较大。

sentences.english: Pure nickel silk with steady potential in KOH solution could be used as reference electrode.
sentences.chinese: 镍作参比电极在氢氧化钾溶液中的电极电势稳定。

sentences.english: However hydroxyl has no effect on carbon dioxide.
sentences.chinese: 但是，氢氧化物却对二氧化碳毫无影响。

sentences.english: Some carbons are activated or washed with phosphoric acid, zinc chloride, or potassium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 一些碳被激活或磷酸，氯化锌或氢氧化钾，洗净。

sentences.english: Hydrolysis was going on in sodium hydroxide solution.
sentences.chinese: 水解在氢氧化钠溶液中进行。

sentences.english: The super-fine aluminium hydroxide is widely used due to its advantages.
sentences.chinese: 超细氢氧化铝具有许多优点，应用广泛。

sentences.english: The relative contents of calcium hydroxide in the colloid are inversely proportional to the colloidal particle size.
sentences.chinese: 胶体中氢氧化钙相对含量与胶粒的大小成反比。

sentences.english: Preparation of magnesia whiskers by high-temperature flux method;
sentences.chinese: 采用循环晶种的方法制取了氢氧化镁。

sentences.english: An auto balance reproducing oxygen supplier using KO 2 and LiOH was provided.
sentences.chinese: 舱内用超氧化钾和氢氧化锂自动平衡供氧。

sentences.english: Objective This paper focused on adjusting the release rates of risperidone from PLGA microspheres by co-encapsulating Mg(OH)2.
sentences.chinese: 目的用氢氧化镁调节利培酮PLGA微球的释放速度。

sentences.english: The influence of operating conditions on the performance of Mg(OH) 2 is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了试验条件对氢氧化镁性能的影响。

sentences.english: Results The calcium hydroxide method could be used to determine arsenical salt accurately.
sentences.chinese: 结果氢氧化钙法能够准确地测出银杏叶片中的砷盐。

sentences.english: Niobium acid was synthesized by potassium hydroxide melting method using different inorganic acid treatment and its properties were characterized by FF-IR, TG and UV-VIS spectra.
sentences.chinese: 采用氢氧化钾熔融法以不同无机酸处理合成了铌酸。
